translated: The Group of Eights🔽The First Chapter
When I first saw the Teacher,
the one who is fearless in every way,
having seen the supreme person.🔽If one were to drive away glory
one would displease such a teacher
Then I abandoned my children and wife,
I cut off my hair and beard,
I would not sit down even for a moment,
not being carried away by the arrow of craving.
The three knowledges have been attained,
the Buddha’s instruction has been done.
I am worthy of offerings, liberated,
Then, at the end of the night,
